content.question: A. Using the location shown in Image 2, describe the concept of place as it relates to pilgrimage locations. B. Explain how a universalizing religion is likely to have an effect on the number of international pilgrimage locations. C. Using the location shown in Image 1, explain how large pilgrimages can create a centripetal force for a religious group. D. Explain ONE way that time-space convergence is contributing to an increase in the number of people traveling to international pilgrimage locations. E. Explain ONE government policy that may be put in place to regulate access to international pilgrimage locations.
